mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your unreasonable demands are our top priority!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into Bank of Entitlement in my designer suit, ready to make a simple withdrawal. But when the teller informed me there would be a five-minute wait, I nearly lost it. Five minutes?! Do you know who I am? I demanded to see the manager, who promptly apologized and escorted me to a VIP lounge where I was served champagne and caviar. Feeling vindicated, I made my withdrawal and left, knowing my entitlement was well-deserved.
